questionSetStimulus: In the following exercises, you are playing the following game that involves rolling 2 dice, one at a time. First, you roll a standard 6-sided die. If the result is a 4 or less, your second roll uses a standard 4-sided die. If the result of the first roll is a 5 or 6, your second roll uses a standard 6-sided die. Find these probabilities:
